attributes.title: don’t get this app🟧✨
attributes.review: i do not recommend this app every time i opened the app my screen would turn orange. this app is a 0/10 it’s no good it makes my phone go slow. to get in the app right after you download there is this very unflattering image of a weird looking thing and it scares me tbh. so moral of my story don’t get this app very glitchy and scary

attributes.title: BAD
attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded this app MY PHONE CAUGHT ON FIRE and then the app UNLEASHED RATS all around the room. i tried to delete it but the app but then it sprayed a poisonous gas from my phone and i COULDN'T SEE ANYTHING. do nit download this app it is cursed!!!

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Immediately after I downloaded the app I got explosive diarrhea and my nose started bleeding 🤮. It made my phone act up and It wouldn’t let me delete it 👿. Frick this app

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. It took so long to download and once it did it kept malfunctioning. I don’t not recommend downloading this pointless app that supports this clown of a president😌

attributes.title: App gave me diarrhea
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, I started having uncontrollable diarrhea all over my house and family. If I could give this app 0 stars if I could.

attributes.title: HISPANIC LIVES MATTER!!!
attributes.review: this is the worst app I’ve ever come across , it doesn’t help others , it takes forever to download. It shouldn’t be an app at all ! It should be taken down.

attributes.title: Never download this!
attributes.review: It drained my entire battery and then roaches started to crawl out of my phone and they looked like the Cheetos who support this terrible man. I do not recommend

attributes.title: Worst app in the history of apps
attributes.review:
This app is atrocious. It took about three MONTHS TO DOWNLOAD THIS APP ! I am disappointed with the lack of support and well being of this app that I am not voting what so ever. Thank you 
Sincerely ~ 𝓴𝓪𝓻𝓮𝓷

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: It crashes every few minutes, I’m pretty sure it gave me a virus, my phone is freaking out. Take it down!

attributes.title: This app should not be on the App Store.
attributes.review: This app is racist. It is supporting the police who murdered an innocent man in cold blood. Me personally and probably a lot others don’t respect that. App Store should remove this app immediately.
